w3af-run.w3af-version: w3af - Web Application Attack and Audit Framework Version: 1.7.6 Revision: unknown Distribution: Kali Linux Rolling Branch: unknown Local changes: No Author: Andres Riancho and the w3af team.

vulnerability.name: Non existent methods default to GET
vulnerability.description: The remote Web server has a custom configuration, in which any not implemented methods that are invoked are defaulted to GET instead of returning a "Not Implemented" response.

http-response.body:
Home
About
Announcement
Contest
Membership
Welcome to join the challenging contest - CUMCM-2016!

CUMCM-2016 will start at 8:00AM 9 September 2016 and end at 8:00AM 12 September 2016 (Beijing Time).

For the participants from regions other than China Mainland and Macau SAR, their registration fee will be waived off. Please register through this website before the extended deadline: 6:00PM, 6 Sept., 2016 (Beijing Time).

CUMCM (Contemporary Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling)

Organizor: CSIAM (China Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics)

Partner and primary sponsor: HEP (Higher Education Press, China)

Partner and sponsor: COMAP - Consortium for Mathematics and Its Application (USA)

Other Sponsors: MathWorks (China) Inc.


Chinese version (Only valid for students from China Mainland and Macau): http://cn.mcm.edu.cn
Major Sponsors:

vulnerability.name: Favicon identification
vulnerability.description: Favicon.ico file was identified as "Zero byte favicon".

vulnerability.name: No DNS wildcard
vulnerability.description: The target site has NO DNS wildcard, and the contents of "http://mcm.edu.cn/" differ from the contents of "http://en.mcm.edu.cn/".

vulnerability.name: Potential virtual host misconfiguration
vulnerability.description: [Manual verification required] The response body for a request with a trailing dot in the domain, and the response body without a trailing dot in the domain differ. This could indicate a misconfiguration in the virtual host settings. In some cases, this misconfiguration permits the attacker to read the source code of the web application.

首页
竞赛组织
历程与动态
赛题与评奖
挑战赛
中学生
赞助商专栏
相关信息
欢迎参加世界上规模最大的数学建模竞赛 -- 一次参赛，终生受益！

 全国大学生数学建模竞赛创办于1992年，每年一届。2016年，来自全国33个省/市/区(包括香港和澳门)及新加坡的1367所院校、31199个队（本科28046队、专科3153队）、93000多名大学生报名参加本项竞赛。

2016年赛题于竞赛开始时（2016年9月9日上午8：00）发布在本站、百链网、中国大学生在线、高等教育出版社、中国高校数学建模课程中心、中国数模等网站。报名参赛请通过百链网进行。

竞赛主办单位及合作机构
 主办: 中国工业与应用数学学会
合作伙伴及独家冠名赞助商: 　高等教育出版社
合作伙伴及支持机构: 　美国COMAP公司（美国MCM/ICM主办机构）
合作网站:　中国大学生在线网站
赞助商:
　迈斯沃克软件 (北京) 有限公司
　同方知网数字出版技术股份有限公司
　北京大雅因和信息技术有限公司

For students outside China Mainland and Macao, please visit the English version .
Major Sponsors:
           
最新文章
  CUMCM通讯2016年第2期（总第48期）
  2016年全国大学生数学建模竞赛赛题讲评与经验交流会在广西大学举行
  2016联合赛区评奖结果
  2016高教社杯全国大学生数学建模竞赛获奖名单
  2017年全国大学生数学建模竞赛征题通知暨命题研讨会第一次通知
  第18届国际数学建模教学与应用会议(南非，2017年7月)
  2016高教社杯全国大学生数学建模竞赛颁奖仪式暨工作会议第一次通知
  关于2016年部分送全国评阅参赛论文存在严重违纪现象的通报
  2016全国大学生数学建模竞赛赛题讲评与经验交流会(第二次通知)
  2016年全国大学生数学建模竞赛赛题讲评与经验交流会第一次通知
指导单位 中国工业与应用数学学会

vulnerability.name: HTML comment contains HTML code
vulnerability.description: A comment with the string "<div> <div class="item"><a href="/">Ho" was found in: "http://en.mcm.edu.cn/". This could be interesting.

vulnerability.name: Blank http response body
vulnerability.description: The URL: "http://en.mcm.edu.cn/favicon.ico" returned an empty body, this could indicate an application error.

vulnerability.name: Strange HTTP response code
vulnerability.description: The remote web server sent 1 HTTP responses with the uncommon response status code 405 using "Method Not Allowed" as message. The first ten URLs which sent the uncommon status code are: - http://en.mcm.edu.cn/BCiNm
vulnerability.long-description: The server responded with a strange HTTP status code. This is a non-issue however exotic HTTP response status codes can provide useful insights into the behavior of the web application and assist with the information security analysis.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Manually inspect the HTTP response status code and body

http-response.body:
Method Not Allowed

The requested method PUT is not allowed for the URL /BCiNm.

vulnerability.name: Default virtual host
vulnerability.description: The contents of http://166.111.25.46/ and http://en.mcm.edu.cn/ differ.

vulnerability.name: HTTP traceroute
vulnerability.description: The routes to the target's HTTP and HTTPS ports are the same: 0 192.168.16.2 1 166.111.25.46

vulnerability.name: Click-Jacking vulnerability
vulnerability.description: The whole target has no protection (X-Frame-Options header) against Click-Jacking attacks
vulnerability.long-description:
Clickjacking (User Interface redress attack, UI redress attack, UI redressing) is a malicious technique of tricking a Web user into clicking on something different from what the user perceives they are clicking on, thus potentially revealing confidential information or taking control of their computer while clicking on seemingly innocuous web pages.
The server didn't return an `X-Frame-Options` header which means that this website could be at risk of a clickjacking attack. The `X-Frame-Options` HTTP response header can be used to indicate whether or not a browser should be allowed to render a page inside a frame or iframe. Sites can use this to avoid clickjacking attacks, by ensuring that their content is not embedded into other sites.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Configure your web server to include an X-Frame-Options header.
